Header.title: Power Your Operations with Precision Engineering
Header.paragraph: From 2-ton pallet stackers to 10-ton telehandlers, we deliver hydraulic solutions that drive India's industries forward.

About.paragraph: GAD Hydraulics is a leading manufacturer and supplier of material handling equipment and hydraulic solutions based in Udaipur, Rajasthan. With over a decade of experience in the industry, we've become a trusted partner for businesses across India seeking reliable, high-performance hydraulic systems. Our state-of-the-art workshop spans 15,000 square feet and houses advanced manufacturing equipment, testing facilities, and a dedicated R&D unit.

Products.name: Hydraulic Components
Products.description: Premium-grade hydraulic cylinders, pumps, valves, hoses, and filters. Custom bore sizes, pressure ratings up to 350 bar, and energy-efficient designs.

Products.name: Semi-Electric Forklifts
Products.description: Energy-efficient 2-ton capacity with 3-meter lift height. Battery-operated lifting with manual operation. Perfect for warehouses and indoor applications.

Products.name: Forklifts (2-10T)
Products.description: Heavy-duty forklifts built for reliability. Available in 2T, 3T, 5T, and 10T capacities. Diesel and LPG options with comprehensive safety features.

Products.name: Telehandlers (2-10T)
Products.description: Versatile telescopic handlers with 6-12 meter reach. Ideal for construction, agriculture, and industrial yards. 4WD options available.

Products.name: Pallet Stackers (2T, 3m)
Products.description: Compact manual and semi-electric pallet stackers. 2-ton capacity with 3-meter lift. Perfect for narrow aisles and small warehouses.

Services.name: Annual Maintenance Contracts
Services.text: Keep your entire fleet operating at peak performance with our comprehensive AMC plans. Scheduled preventive maintenance, priority service calls, and 20% discount on spare parts included.

Services.name: On-Site Repair & Diagnostics
Services.text: Emergency breakdown response within 24-48 hours anywhere in India. Our mobile service units handle hydraulic system diagnostics, electrical troubleshooting, and component replacement.

Services.name: Hydraulic Refurbishing
Services.text: Extend equipment life with professional refurbishing services. Cost savings up to 70% vs new replacement, with like-new performance and 6-month warranty on refurbished components.

Services.name: Custom Fabrication
Services.text: Our engineering team designs and builds custom hydraulic systems for specialized applications including custom hydraulic power units, specialized lifting attachments, and custom cylinder designs.

Services.name: Pan-India Delivery
Services.text: From our Udaipur facility, we serve clients across India with reliable logistics and timely delivery. Full fleet tracking and secure transportation for all equipment.

Services.name: Operator Training Programs
Services.text: Comprehensive training programs for forklift, telehandler, and pallet stacker operators. Safety certification, best practices, and hands-on equipment familiarization included.

Testimonials.text: "GAD Hydraulics transformed our warehouse operations. Their semi-electric forklifts reduced our energy costs by 40% while improving efficiency. The after-sales support is exceptional."
Testimonials.name: Rajesh Mehta, Logistics Manager

Testimonials.text: "The after-sales service is exceptional. When our 5-ton forklift needed repairs, their team was on-site within 24 hours. Highly recommend their AMC contracts."
Testimonials.name: Priya Sharma, Operations Head

Testimonials.text: "We've been using their telehandlers for three years. Zero major breakdowns, excellent ROI. The custom fabrication team solved our unique material handling challenge perfectly."
Testimonials.name: Arun Kumar, Construction Director

Testimonials.text: "GAD's in-house engineering expertise sets them apart. They designed a custom hydraulic solution for our manufacturing line that increased productivity by 35%."
Testimonials.name: Vikram Singh, Plant Manager

Testimonials.text: "Reliable equipment, competitive pricing, and responsive service. Their pallet stackers have been running flawlessly in our cold storage facility for over two years."
Testimonials.name: Meena Patel, Warehouse Supervisor

Testimonials.text: "From initial consultation to final delivery, the experience was seamless. The team understood our requirements and delivered exactly what we needed, on time and within budget."
Testimonials.name: Suresh Reddy, Procurement Manager

Contact.address: GAD Hydraulics, Industrial Area, Udaipur, Rajasthan - 313001, India

Features.title: In-House Engineering
Features.text: Our team designs and manufactures custom hydraulic solutions tailored to your specific requirements. Superior quality control and faster service response.

Features.title: Quality Assurance
Features.text: Every component undergoes rigorous testing before delivery. ISO certified manufacturing processes ensure consistent quality and reliability.

Features.title: Expert Support Team
Features.text: Dedicated hydraulic specialists ready to help you choose the right equipment. Technical consultation, operator training, and 24/7 emergency support.

Features.title: Proven Track Record
Features.text: Over 1000 satisfied customers across India trust GAD Hydraulics. Decade-long expertise in material handling and hydraulic engineering solutions.
